translation.zh: 从20世纪70年代开始

translation.en: video games have been part of the way we play.
translation.zh: 电子游戏就成了我们娱乐的方式之一

translation.en: Being individually, in groups, involving mental or physical activity.
translation.zh: 单独玩 组队玩有脑力游戏 也有体力游戏

translation.en: For leisure, to win or to learn,
translation.zh: 或为了休闲 或为了胜利 或为了学习

translation.en: they haven't stopped evolving.
translation.zh: 游戏一直在进化

translation.en: Today, parents and children are facing enormous challenges
translation.zh: 在今天的世界 家长和孩子都面临着巨大的挑战

translation.en: in a world in which the Internet has changed the way we communicate,
translation.zh: 互联网改变了我们交流的方式

translation.en: the way we relate to each other.
translation.zh: 改变了我们建立感情的方式

translation.en: A world in which video games are changing the way we play.
translation.zh: 这是一个电子游戏改变着我们玩耍方式的世界

translation.en: [Gail] We didn't know what we were heading into.
translation.zh: 我们并不知道自己将进入何处

translation.en: So you're looking for the things that might be dangerous.
translation.zh: 所以你会想先看看可能有危险的东西

translation.en: [Sonia] His obsession is to find a gap to play.
translation.zh: 他痴迷于找游戏玩

translation.en: [Michal] You don't want your child to read 12 hours a day.
translation.zh: 你不会想自己的孩子看上12小时的书

translation.en: You don't want your child to climb trees all day either.
translation.zh: 也不会想让他们整天爬树

translation.en: They were born into a world that's connected.
translation.zh: 像《黑客帝国》里那样他们出生在互联的世界

translation.en: Children need to have their own leisure.
translation.zh: 孩子们必须有自己的休闲活动

translation.en: [man] The problem is how much is enough?
translation.zh: 问题是 多少才算足够？

translation.en: We can't regulate something we don't understand.
translation.zh: 我们无法去约束自己不明白的事物

translation.en: This is the world.
translation.zh: 这个世界现在就是这个样子

translation.en: [girl] They don't like girls playing.
translation.zh: 他们不会想要知道有个女孩在一起玩

translation.en: [John] Running or kicking football. It is as if you were there.
translation.zh: 奔跑 踢球…它让你有实感

translation.en: [Mathew] All he wanted to do
translation.zh: 他只想

translation.en: was be able to succeed in this virtual world.
translation.zh: 能够在这个虚拟世界得到成功

translation.en: -[cheers] -E-sports is eSports, gaming is gaming.
translation.zh: 电竞是电竞 游戏是游戏

translation.en: [man] Society has a problem with new medium.
translation.zh: 社会对新的媒介总会有疑问

translation.en: Why don't we learn from that?
translation.zh: 我们何不开始从中学习呢？

translation.en: [narrator] The shift from mechanical and analog technology
translation.zh: 从机械和模拟技术

translation.en: to digital electronics
translation.zh: 到数字电子技术的转变

translation.en: has created a revolution that is changing the way we live our lives
translation.zh: 创造了一场革命它改变着我们的生活方式

translation.en: like never before.
translation.zh: 这境况是前所未有的

translation.en: It started in the '40s and '50s,
translation.zh: 电子游戏是从上世纪四五十年代开始的

translation.en: when scientists developed the first computers.
translation.zh: 当时 科学家发开了第一批计算机

translation.en: Some of these computers were able to play games like chess, checkers or OXO,
translation.zh: 这其中的一些计算机 能够运行游戏比如象棋 跳棋 或者OXO井字棋

translation.en: a noughts and crosses game developed by British Professor Alexander Douglas.
translation.zh: 是一款圈叉游戏它的开发者是英国教授 亚历山大道格拉斯

translation.en: In 1958, William Higginbotham created Tennis for Two,
translation.zh: 1958年 威廉希金波坦发明了《二人网球》游戏

translation.en: a game on an oscilloscope, an analog computer,
translation.zh: 是一款运行在示波器也就是模拟计算机上的游戏

translation.en: which anticipated later video games like Pong.
translation.zh: 在它的启发下如《乓》之类的电子游戏陆续到来

translation.en: Spacewalk is a space combat video game, developed at MIT in 1962.
translation.zh: 《太空大战》是麻省理工学院1962年开发的一款太空战斗电子游戏

translation.en: It is considered the first video game
translation.zh: 它被认为是世上第一款电子游戏

translation.en: because it could be played on many computer installations.
translation.zh: 因为它可以在许多计算机装置上运行

translation.en: [Daniel] Video games didn't become commercially available until Pong.
translation.zh: 在《乓》之前的电子游戏均未商业化

translation.en: We had the Arcades, which transitioned to home consoles.
translation.zh: 所以 我们是先有游戏厅然后过渡到了家庭游戏机

translation.en: The Magnavox Odyssey was the actual first home console.
translation.zh: 米罗华公司的奥德赛游戏机是真正意义上第一部家庭游戏机

translation.en: [man on TV] Families who let television do its thing
translation.zh: 那些乐意让电视自由发挥的家庭

translation.en: often are at its mercy for their choice of entertainment,
translation.zh: 经常发现自己能享受什么娱乐得听天由命

translation.en: while people who want television to do their thing
translation.zh: 而那些想让电视机为自己服务的人

translation.en: entertain themselves with Oddysey, the electronic game of the future.
translation.zh: 会用奥德赛游戏机来取悦自己 这是未来的电子游戏

translation.en: [Daniel] And then we started to get all the Pongs, and then the Ataris.
translation.zh: 然后我们就开始接触到了《乓》这类还有雅达利游戏公司的系列游戏

translation.en: Then computers started to kind of take over.
translation.zh: 接着电脑就开始取而代之了

translation.en: [Julian] Commodore 64, Nintendo Entertainment System,
translation.zh: 比如康懋达C64电脑还有任天堂红白机

translation.en: and then Sega Master System in the early '80s.
translation.zh: 以及上世纪80年代的世嘉手柄游戏机

translation.en: It was a real revolution, everybody could play these games at home.
translation.zh: 那是一场真正的革命 因为每个人都能在家里玩电子游戏

translation.en: You didn't have to go to an arcade.
translation.zh: 你不用去游戏厅了

translation.en: [Daniel] The transition from playing on your own or locally
translation.zh: 独自或只在本地玩游戏的日子随着科技的发展

translation.en: went with technology.
translation.zh: 而渐渐发生转变

translation.en: Back in the early SEGA days, you had the…
translation.zh: 在早期世嘉时代 游戏机上有附件

translation.en: the add on that would let you connect to the Internet and play with people.
translation.zh: 可以让你连上互联网在有限条件下跟别人一起玩

translation.en: [Richard] We made MUD. It wasn't quite as…
translation.zh: 我们做出了MUD游戏 它并不是我们想要的那种包罗万象的虚拟现实

translation.en: all-encompassing a reality that we wanted
translation.zh: 它并不是我们想要的那种包罗万象的虚拟现实

translation.en: because the computers weren't strong enough.
translation.zh: 因为那时的计算机不够强大

translation.en: [Daniel] Technology progressed. As Internet became more standard in homes
translation.zh: 随着技术进步 以及互联网渐渐成为家庭标配

translation.en: with PlayStation Network and Xbox Live and a lot of the computer play,
translation.zh: 有了索尼的PS网络服务和微软Xbox网络服务 及许许多多的电脑游戏

translation.en: they started to really find servers and waiting rooms
translation.zh: 人们开始找到服务器 等候室大厅等地方

translation.en: where everyone's connecting through an online Internet
translation.zh: 每个人都通过在这些地方通过线上网络互联

translation.en: and you could find other people to play with.
translation.zh: 每个人都通过在这些地方通过线上网络互联 这样你就能找到其他人一起玩了

translation.en: It was revolutionary.
translation.zh: 这是革命性的创举

translation.en: Now, you didn't have to know someone to play with.
translation.zh: 现在你不必找朋友或认识的人才能玩游戏

translation.en: You could finally start to just wait for a game,
translation.zh: 你终于可以开始等待游戏本身

translation.en: for someone to play.
translation.zh: 等着有人上线开玩即可

translation.en: [narrator] With the arrival of Internet and fast connections at home,
translation.zh: 随着互联网和家庭高速接入的到来

translation.en: the amount of time children and young people
translation.zh: 儿童和年轻人们

translation.en: spend on digital and online gaming has increased.
translation.zh: 花在数码和线上游戏的时间增加了

translation.en: Some parents have struggled to make this digital transition.
translation.zh: 一些家长一直在努力实现这种数字化的转变

translation.en: and understand the needs and interests of their children,
translation.zh: 试图理解自己孩子的需求和兴趣

translation.en: the way they play, what makes them happy.
translation.zh: 搞懂他们玩耍的方式以及让他们快乐的东西

translation.en: -The new world they live in. -[child] What the fuck?
translation.zh: 这是他们生活的新世界 操啊！搞什么？

translation.en: The development of online gaming,
translation.zh: 网络游戏的发展

translation.en: alongside the development of social media as well,
translation.zh: 伴随着更多社交媒体的发展

translation.en: has allowed this kind of gamer culture and mixed with
translation.zh: 给了玩家文化生长的土壤 并与粉丝文化的巨大浪潮融合

translation.en: the larger kind of trends towards fandom,
translation.zh: 并与粉丝文化的巨大浪潮融合

translation.en: towards participatory media, people creating their own content,
translation.zh: 汇集成一种参与式的媒介 即用户自行创作内容这种媒介不仅是在线娱乐

translation.en: is making the games online and allowing the communities to coalesce online.
translation.zh: 即用户自行创作内容这种媒介不仅是在线娱乐 另一方面也让各个群体在网上汇聚

translation.en: You can see on YouTube, on Twitch,
translation.zh: 你可以看到的 在YoutubeTwitch游戏直播网这类平台上

translation.en: on all of these platforms the ways people are using video games
translation.zh: 你可以看到的 在YoutubeTwitch游戏直播网这类平台上 人们是如何用电子游戏去影响

translation.en: to influence a world that reaches far beyond what they expect.
translation.zh: 人们是如何用电子游戏去影响 一个广阔得远超大家想象的世界

translation.en: [Luzu] Younger people connect better with video games,
translation.zh: 年轻人和电子游戏更有共鸣

translation.en: I loved playing video games since I was a kid.
translation.zh: 我从小就爱玩电子游戏

translation.en: It gave me a chance to talk about other things
translation.zh: 打游戏让我有机会聊其他东西

translation.en: and talk about my day
translation.zh: 聊聊我的日常啊

translation.en: and connect with this audience in a different way
translation.zh: 用和我的视频日志频道不一样的方式

translation.en: than I did with my blog.
translation.zh: 跟我的观众们相会

translation.en: I used to play from time to time, but then I stopped playing.
translation.zh: 我以前是个业余玩家 但后来不玩了

translation.en: I focused more on comedy, on making sketches, videos.
translation.zh: 我转向了喜剧专注于制作小品和视频 （内容创作人墨西哥 墨西哥城）

translation.en: I wanted to start with a passion, something completely new.
translation.zh: 我想要带着一种激情开始做出全新的东西

translation.zh: （送到全球一千五百万观众的眼前） 你开了暖气啊 蠢货！

translation.zh: 我知道 靠！

translation.zh: 干什么开暖气啊？就他妈的没道理！

translation.zh: 我的天！

translation.zh: 见鬼了！现在她开始在那里…

translation.zh: 你会砸到地板的！

translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.zh: 我发现如果你打扰青少年玩电子游戏

translation.en: an aggressive streak comes out.
translation.zh: 他们会显现出攻击性

translation.zh: 他们的行为突然变得异常好像不是你认识的那个人了 （作家兼品牌专家西班牙 马德里）

translation.zh: 小朋友的生活中经常有各种各样的状况

translation.zh: 所以 过度玩游戏是一种症状而不是问题本身

translation.en: -[screams] -[plastic breaks]
translation.zh: 操！

translation.zh: 我真的 你们这些人实在太…

translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.zh: 我扔了手柄 它弹起来

translation.zh: 一个按钮 那个L1按键掉到桌子下面了… （乔恩莱尔西班牙 马德里）

translation.zh: 那个手柄就坏了

translation.en: and it seems something inside is broken,
translation.zh: 好像里面也有东西坏了

translation.en: and, when you move it like this, it sounds like maracas,
translation.zh: 然后这样摇的话还会发出沙锤的声音

translation.zh: 就好像里面有东西碎掉了

translation.zh: 我叫他别玩了他就说：“不 等一会儿”

translation.zh: 这个“一会儿”可能是一小时他永远玩不够

translation.zh: （索尼娅卡诺建筑师兼玩家的妈妈） 然后他就会气呼呼地回房间

translation.zh: 然后他就会气呼呼地回房间

translation.zh: 我妈允许我玩游戏不过她不喜欢我玩太多

translation.zh: 她想不到游戏多有吸引力因为她小时候没有跟游戏一起成长

translation.en: It wasn't part of her time.
translation.zh: 游戏不是她生活的一部分罢了

translation.en: [Patrick] We didn't see any harm in it.
translation.zh: 我们之前没看到玩游戏有什么害处

translation.en: While I was so young, I couldn't have,
translation.zh: 我那时候太小 肯定预见不到但我父母也一样没看到

translation.zh: 我那时候太小 肯定预见不到但我父母也一样没看到 我们并不知道玩游戏会伤害我

translation.zh: 我们并不知道玩游戏会伤害我

translation.zh: 我爸会说：“不能再玩了” 我心里就想着 不玩不行的“你不懂”

translation.en: You don't get it.
translation.zh: 我心里就想着 不玩不行的“你不懂”

translation.en: His obsession is to find a gap to play.
translation.zh: 他痴迷于找游戏玩

translation.zh: 我们不让他平日里玩因为他学习任务很重

translation.en: [Marcos] My mum says it's very bad,
translation.zh: 我妈妈说游戏不是好东西

translation.en: but, if I don't play on weekdays, I want to play at the weekend.
translation.zh: 可是如果平时不让我玩了那周末我还是要玩的 （冈萨雷斯 马德里）

translation.en: It's not necessarily about putting the blame on the kids
translation.zh: 重点并不在于一定要责备孩子

translation.en: or on the parents.
translation.zh: 或者怪罪家长

translation.en: It's about recognizing the environments in which kids are.
translation.zh: 而是在于认识到孩子们身处的环境

translation.en: Family life has changed a lot because of technology
translation.zh: 因为技术的进步家庭生活发生了很大改变

translation.zh: 而这个改变也受到孩子们自娱自乐的方式影响

translation.zh: 家长会担心是因为他们接收到的信息

translation.zh: 家长会担心是因为他们接收到的信息 很多人说玩游戏可能有危险

translation.zh: 孩子们花了多少时间玩游戏

translation.zh: 这些游戏又如何影响了孩子的社交生活和家庭生活

translation.zh: 因此家长的行为可能包含了道德恐慌的成分在内

translation.zh: 回顾历史的话 你会发现 十八、十九世纪时人们曾对女童读小说这件事有过恐慌

translation.en: you know, back in 1700s and 1800s
translation.zh: 十八、十九世纪时人们曾对女童读小说这件事有过恐慌

translation.en: because they spent time in that, and it wasn't good.
translation.zh: 因为她们把时间花在这上面这对她们不是好事之类的

translation.en: But there is an important difference with gaming, the social interaction.
translation.zh: 但是 这跟玩游戏又有很大区别 这个区别就在于社交互动

translation.en: You read a novel, you listen to the radio…
translation.zh: 你看小说 听收音机的时候

translation.zh: 是单向的动作

translation.en: This is communication.
translation.zh: 玩游戏是有交流的

translation.zh: 这就会增加额外的因素因为父母可能会不舒服了

translation.zh: 这就会增加额外的因素因为父母可能会不舒服了 他们不仅不知道自己家的少年儿童会看到什么

translation.zh: 这种担心是实实在在的

translation.zh: 他们不让蜘蛛靠近我 就安全了

translation.zh: 她总会看看床底下

translation.zh: 我有护膝 护肘 还有头盔

translation.zh: 世上并没有会偷你衣服的吸血鬼

translation.zh: 我妈妈叫我系好安全带

translation.zh: “过马路之前 一定要牵着妈妈的手”

translation.zh: 否则我会被车撞到的

translation.zh: 会很疼的

translation.zh: 我妈妈让我打曲棍球的时候要戴好护齿

translation.zh: 因为我的牙齿非常重要

translation.zh: 我在比如排队的时候一定得拉着他们的手

translation.zh: 因为可能会有坏人把我抓走

translation.zh: 陌生人危险！

translation.zh: 家长是怎么保障你上网安全的呀？

translation.zh: 孩子们在网上有可能会遇到不合适的内容

translation.zh: 可能对于他们的年龄来说过于成熟也有网络霸凌的风险

translation.zh: 这一刻 涉及到的是成千上万的孩子他们都无法正常生活

translation.zh: 我总觉得跟我的家人 朋友很疏远

translation.zh: 游戏给了我一种逃避 一种解脱

translation.zh: 那是一种…我生命中其他任何东西都带不来的快乐

translation.zh: 我拒绝走出自己的卧室

translation.zh: 特别害怕与人交流我也不知道怎么跟人交流

translation.en: You start to feel the…
translation.zh: 你开始感觉到…

translation.en: the size of the problem when you start to lose the dialogue.
translation.zh: 感觉到问题的严重性当你开始无法对话

translation.en: When… you cannot… interact that much anymore.
translation.zh: 当你再也无法怎么互动了

translation.zh: 我开始自我否定 我怪自己焦虑 怪自己抑郁

translation.zh: 我知道我跟我爸聊过这个问题他问：“怎么啦？”

translation.en: "What's going on?" I was like,
translation.zh: 我知道我跟我爸聊过这个问题他问：“怎么啦？” 我就说：“我不知道怎么了”

translation.en: "I don't know what's going on. I just know that
translation.zh: 我就说：“我不知道怎么了” “只知道我已经受不了了”

translation.en: I can't manage it anymore. Something is stopping me and…
translation.zh: “只知道我已经受不了了” “有什么在阻碍我 我很无助”

translation.zh: “有什么在阻碍我 我很无助”

translation.en: The first action is to admit you have a problem
translation.zh: 第一步 你要承认自己有问题

translation.zh: 而且你靠自己解决不了问题

translation.zh: 大多数孩子意识得到问题所在

translation.en: but the solution they found is one that doesn't work.
translation.zh: 但他们自己找的解决方式往往是无效的

translation.zh: 可能是转向吸毒 酗酒

translation.zh: 割腕 自残

translation.zh: 自我封闭 以及 当然无休止地玩电子游戏

translation.zh: 一天能玩15到18小时

translation.zh: 当玩游戏这件事逐渐失控

translation.zh: 游戏行为就会变为失常

translation.en: The person's internal controls are weak,
translation.zh: 患者的自我控制力很弱

translation.en: and also there is increased priority to gaming as a behavior
translation.zh: 以及还有 与生活中其他活动相比

translation.en: compared to other activities in life.
translation.zh: 游戏这件事变得越来越重要

translation.en: Not going to school anymore, not going to your sports club,
translation.zh: 不再上学 不再参加体育运动

translation.en: not connecting with your family, friends anymore.
translation.zh: 不再跟家人 朋友亲近

translation.en: So it takes over your life.
translation.zh: 游戏主宰了你的人生

translation.en: Instead of a how much question,
translation.zh: 与其问“多少”这个问题

translation.en: the much more important one is a why question.
translation.zh: “为什么”这个问题反而重要得多

translation.en: So why are you playing a video game?
translation.zh: 所以 你为什么玩电子游戏？

translation.en: And fundamentally, the question is,
translation.zh: 还有 从根本上来说 应该问

translation.en: are you playing it because you feel you want to?
translation.zh: 你是因为想玩而玩吗？

translation.en: Is it a choice?
translation.zh: 是你选择的吗？

translation.en: Or are you feeling that you're playing because you feel like you have to?
translation.zh: 还是因为你觉得非玩不可才去玩呢？

translation.en: A sense of compulsion. A sense of obsession.
translation.zh: 一种强迫 一种痴迷

translation.en: [Vini] At first, I thought it was because I was depressed
translation.zh: 一开始 我以为只是因为我心情压抑

translation.en: and because I was anxious a lot, I was very anxious.
translation.zh: 因为我总是焦虑 我当时非常焦虑

translation.en: But later I found out, you know, I'm an addict.
translation.zh: 但后来我才发觉 自己上瘾了

translation.en: [Jan] The moment they feel safe and secure to start sharing the real problems,
translation.zh: 一旦他们感到足够安全 足够安心 可以开始说出真正的问题

translation.en: their traumas, their anxiety, their depression, etc.,
translation.zh: 说出他们的伤痛 焦虑 压力等等

translation.en: we confront them to make sure the change in their behavior is coming.
translation.zh: 我们就去面对它们确保孩子们的行为开始改变

translation.en: I came out no more games.
translation.zh: 我出来了 不再玩游戏了

translation.en: I asked my parents to remove my computer or my…
translation.zh: 叫我父母搬走我的电脑

translation.en: my consoles, all of that.
translation.zh: 搬走我的游戏机 全部搬走

translation.en: [Rubens] He followed the advice. It depends a lot of…
translation.zh: 他听从了建议 这很大程度取决于你的意志你的决心

translation.en: your will.
translation.zh: 这很大程度取决于你的意志你的决心

translation.en: Your determination, and I think he has been very determined.
translation.zh: 我认为他非常坚定

translation.en: [Jan] If youngsters find the right balance of playing
translation.zh: 如果青少年或年轻人能找到正确的方式

translation.en: like 40, 50, 60, 70 hours a week by training
translation.zh: 在一周训练40 50 60 70小时

translation.en: and going to their next tournament so they can make
translation.zh: 和下一个游戏锦标赛之间取得平衡以期挣得大量金钱

translation.en: a lot of money or become even better,
translation.zh: 和下一个游戏锦标赛之间取得平衡以期挣得大量金钱 或变得更加优秀

translation.en: what's the difference between that or a football player?
translation.zh: 那他们跟职业足球运动员还有什么区别呢？

translation.en: Not a big difference.
translation.zh: 我看不出差别来

translation.en: We never had a kid coming in here
translation.zh: 我们从来没有收治过本身就是电竞选手的孩子

translation.en: who was also a E-sport player. We never had that. Never.
translation.zh: 我们从来没有收治过本身就是电竞选手的孩子 从来没有 从未

translation.en: Because they are being coached, they are being trained.
translation.zh: 因为他们是接受训练的他们有… 他们有教练

translation.en: Maybe they even have parents who are motivating them or helping them.
translation.zh: 甚至可能还有鼓励帮助他们的家长

translation.en: It's the other ones. It's the ones who are isolated.
translation.zh: 来这里的不是这样的孩子是那些封闭自己的

translation.en: It's the ones you don't hear, the ones you don't see but who are always there online.
translation.zh: 那些无人倾听 无人注意的但一直都在网上的孩子

translation.en: [María] The red light is to not know what your child is doing.
translation.zh: 如果不知道你的孩子在做什么那就是红灯亮了

translation.en: Not know what games he's using, Not know how many hours he plays.
translation.zh: 不知道他在玩什么游戏不知道他玩了多久的游戏

translation.en: There's much misunderstanding about gaming within the families,
translation.zh: 对于玩游戏这件事家人之间存在许多误解

translation.en: and a lot of parents really don't know how to… educate their own children.
translation.zh: 许多家长实际上并不知道如何教育孩子

translation.en: How to teach them to cope with gaming within their lives, within their homes.
translation.zh: 如何在生活中 在家中教会他们怎么正确对待游戏

translation.en: [Marcos] There's no real evidence showing the use of video games or tablets
translation.zh: 没有实证显示 玩电子游戏或平板

translation.en: can be negative for the development of a child or of a child's brain.
translation.zh: 会对孩子或其大脑发育产生负面影响

translation.en: It's the acquisition of a new ability, that can be somewhat enriching.
translation.zh: 这是在获得一种丰富生活的新能力

translation.en: Having said that, the problem is the time limit.
translation.zh: （神经心理学家 路博国际医院） 问题在于时间限制

translation.en: How much time does a child spend with a tablet or a video game?
translation.zh: 一个孩子在平板或电子游戏上能花多长时间？

translation.en: That's what we need to limit.
translation.zh: 这才是我们要限制的问题

translation.en: Because if they play too much,
translation.zh: 因为如果玩得太久

translation.en: they're not doing other things essential for their natural development,
translation.zh: 他们肯定没有完成其他对其自然成长有必要的活动

translation.en: such as playing with other kids, interact with objects, practice sport.
translation.zh: 比如和其他小朋友玩耍与物品互动 体育锻炼等等

translation.en: [Michal] As a parent, you're responsible for making sure that
translation.zh: 作为家长 你有责任确保

translation.en: your child's life is balanced.
translation.zh: 自己小孩的生活是平衡的

translation.en: You don't want your child to read books 12 hours a day.
translation.zh: 你不会想自己的孩子每天看12小时的书

translation.en: You don't want your child to climb trees all day either.
translation.zh: 也不会想让他整天爬树

translation.en: The problem is the sedentary lifestyle, and not just not doing sports,
translation.zh: 问题在于这种久坐不动的生活方式 不只是不运动而是我们坐着的时间太长

translation.en: but the time we are sitting down,
translation.zh: （基隆萨鲁德医疗集团内分泌与营养科）

translation.en: whether we're playing video games, watching a series,
translation.zh: 不管是坐着玩游戏 看电视剧

translation.en: or sitting down working very long hours.
translation.zh: 还是长时间坐着工作

translation.en: This has a negative impact on our health.
translation.zh: 都对我们的身体健康有负面影响

translation.zh: 有段时间 我处于人生低谷

translation.en: It was very hard for me to… enjoy life in general,
translation.zh: 我做什么都很难提得起劲

translation.zh: 我跟家里也不太愉快从内心感到自我厌恶

translation.en: And it became to a point where…
translation.zh: 直到我到了一个…

translation.en: I at some point was diagnosed with major depression,
translation.zh: 一个地步 被确诊患有严重抑郁

translation.en: and it was very hard to just even get up in the bed in the morning.
translation.zh: 连早上起床都十分困难

translation.en: Things like suicidal ideation, things like that. I had a lot of issues.
translation.zh: 有了轻生的念头之类的 我真的出毛病了

translation.en: I feel like I wouldn't be here today if it wasn't for video games.
translation.zh: 我觉得 要不是电子游戏和玩游戏时认识的人

translation.en: And the people I met through them as well.
translation.zh: 我都撑不到今天

translation.zh: 我认识他的时候 他还小

translation.zh: 也就大概十五六岁的样子

translation.zh: 但永远笑容满面 总愿意快乐地玩 开心地笑

translation.en: He loves playing these games.
translation.zh: 他是真爱玩这些游戏

translation.en: It's really like a part of him. And you can see when he plays
translation.zh: 游戏真的是他的一部分在他玩的时候 你就能看得出来

translation.en: how happy he is while doing it.
translation.zh: 看他玩得多么快乐

translation.zh: 在纽约市 咱们这个区域

translation.en: they didn't have a computer,
translation.zh: 以前没人有电脑

translation.en: you know, computer, video store or anything like that.
translation.zh: 或者电游商店啊什么之类的

translation.en: So, he found a place in New Jersey. And, you know…
translation.zh: 他就在新泽西找了个地方

translation.en: I figured since he wasn't playing sports,
translation.zh: 我就想 既然他也不搞体育了

translation.en: it would be good for him to at least
translation.zh: 可能至少 能参加些比赛什么的提高提高他的自信

translation.zh: 可能至少 能参加些比赛什么的提高提高他的自信 对他也算有好处

translation.en: Once a week, I took him over there from Friday's,
translation.zh: 我每周五送他过去 一周一次

translation.en: and, you know, from there he had his first competition
translation.zh: 就是从那里 你知道吗 他第一次参加了那种…

translation.zh: 他第一次参加了那种… 你知道吧 第一次直播比赛

translation.en: [Aziza] He was like, you know, really withdrawn, really quiet.
translation.zh: 他那时就特别内向 特别安静

translation.en: But the more he traveled, the more of himself became to be, like…
translation.zh: 但去的地方越多 他就变得越自在

translation.en: He started to believe in himself more, and I tried…
translation.zh: 就像他已经开始更有自信了 我就不断迫使他前进

translation.zh: 我就不断迫使他前进

translation.zh: 因为他真的是个优秀的选手优秀的小伙子

translation.zh: 这几乎成为我的家了 第二个家

translation.zh: 她总是关照着我

translation.zh: 给我很多帮助 我觉得随着岁月流逝 这种关系

translation.zh: 我觉得随着岁月流逝 这种关系 是愈发亲厚了

translation.zh: 我从小就爱玩赛车游戏

translation.en: They were my favourite games and, my father was to blame for that.
translation.zh: 赛车游戏是我的最爱 都怪我爸

translation.en: I started with karting like any other driver who dreams of being in Formula 1.
translation.zh: 我跟每个梦想驾驶F1赛车的车手一样从卡丁车开始玩起

translation.zh: 我哥升入了方程式赛车队我却停在了卡丁车这里

translation.zh: 因为没有遇到过机会

translation.zh: 我玩电子游戏 是想玩模拟赛车

translation.en: so that I felt like a real driver.
translation.zh: 让我能有真正赛车手的感受

translation.en: My life changed with Gran Turismo 5 Prologue.
translation.zh: 《GT赛车5：序章》改变了我的人生

translation.en: In 2008, this opportunity came up for me to qualify for…
translation.zh: 2008年 我得到了机会

translation.en: [hesitates] for the Dubai 24 Hour Race.
translation.zh: 参加迪拜24小时耐力赛

translation.en: A real challenge in a real car. And everything began there. I qualified.
translation.zh: 开真赛车的现实比赛 一切就从那里开始了 我入围了

translation.zh: 我有压力 我要证明我是那个

translation.zh: 我有压力 我要证明我是那个 打败了2.5万人 必须承担后果的人

translation.zh: 打败了2.5万人 必须承担后果的人

translation.zh: 我就在那里代表着所有为了梦想拼搏的选手

translation.zh: 梦想着成为职业赛车手的人

translation.zh: 我就在那里 装备齐全 戴着头盔身边三四十台赛车环绕

translation.zh: 装备齐全 戴着头盔身边三四十台赛车环绕 我必须拿下这项任务

translation.zh: 从坐在模拟赛车控制台上对着屏幕 对着电视

translation.zh: 到坐在赛车里 被对手团团包围

translation.zh: 这是巨大的飞跃

translation.zh: 在模拟机上不会遇到的情形在真实赛车中是必须面对的

translation.zh: 那就是风险 你是在用生命冒险

translation.zh: 模拟游戏里 你撞车没关系按重来按钮

translation.en: get a new car and you are safe.
translation.zh: 换上辆新车 安全得很

translation.zh: 那是梦想成真 但我并不满足

translation.zh: 汤姆克里斯滕森 勒芒之王本赛事夺冠次数最多的车手

translation.zh: 在我第一次参赛时过来问我

translation.zh: “卢卡斯 你就是那个玩赛车游戏的人吗？”

translation.en: And you are here now? Is that true?" I said, "Yes, it's true."
translation.zh: “而你现在来参加比赛了？真的吗？”我说：“是真的”

translation.en: I was amazed, I was just 23,
translation.zh: 我感到不可思议 我才23岁

translation.en: because Kristensen came to talk to me about this.
translation.zh: 克里斯滕森竟然来跟我聊天了

translation.en: It's an amazing feeling. The best day of my life.
translation.zh: 那种感觉太美妙了 那是我人生中最美好的一天

translation.en: My family couldn't believe it back then.
translation.zh: 我家人那时候还不敢相信呢

translation.en: But, my father, above all, was really touched to see me there. Everybody was.
translation.zh: 但我父亲看到我领奖那是相当感动的 大家都很感动

translation.en: It's incredible when you think that from a video game, in three years,
translation.zh: 想来都不可思议从一个电子游戏 玩了三年

translation.en: you could be in the most prestigious race in the world.
translation.zh: 竟能走进全世界最顶级的赛事

translation.en: I made lots of friends in karting and they go nuts because, 20 years later,
translation.zh: 我在卡丁车界有很多朋友他们都疯了 因为20年后

translation.en: I'm currently competing thanks to a video game.
translation.zh: 我竟然因为玩游戏成为了赛车手

translation.en: While they kept on fighting so long in karting,
translation.zh: 他们还在卡丁车队年复一年地拼搏

translation.zh: 在方程式赛车晋级选拔和真实的竞争中拼杀

translation.zh: 而我靠《GT赛车》这款游戏走了捷径

translation.zh: 我认为我们在模拟赛车历史上写下了转折点

translation.zh: 现在 你能看到许多青少年通过这条路追寻梦想了

translation.zh: 一开始 我们以为弄错了

translation.zh: 我被告知医生们开始了治疗流程但他并没有任何好转

translation.zh: 相反 病情一再加重

translation.zh: 医生们这才告诉我他们对雅高的病情束手无策

translation.zh: 我查到波士顿的儿童医院

translation.zh: 有医生正在开展临床试验

translation.zh: 雅高被彻底隔离因为他完全没有抵抗力

translation.zh: 任何病毒都能杀死他

translation.en: For this reason, he was in a 4-square-meter room, in bed.
translation.zh: 因此 他只能待在一个4平米的房间里终日不下床

translation.en: As a mother, I had to stimulate my child,
translation.zh: 作为母亲 我必须激励我的孩子

translation.en: because I realised he couldn't be sleeping 24 hours a day.
translation.zh: 因为我意识到 他不能一天睡24小时

translation.en: The director of Juegaterapia told me, "Why don't we give Yago a console
translation.zh: 维加特拉皮亚的主管跟我说 “不如给雅高一个游戏机让他玩游戏怎么样？”

translation.en: so that he has something to play with? Let's stimulate him through games:
translation.zh: “不如给雅高一个游戏机让他玩游戏怎么样？” “我们用游戏激励他吧

translation.en: memory games, puzzles, games with animals,
translation.zh: 记忆游戏 拼图游戏有动物的游戏 什么都行

translation.en: whatever, but Yago needs his brain to start moving."
translation.zh: 关键是要让雅高的动脑”

translation.en: [Elena] Being creative, also…
translation.zh: 要有创意还要决定你的游戏里会发生什么事

translation.en: deciding what will happen in your game, where you want to go,
translation.zh: 要有创意还要决定你的游戏里会发生什么事 你想去哪里 想玩哪一级的游戏

translation.en: what level you want to play, which superhero you want to fight with,
translation.zh: 你想去哪里 想玩哪一级的游戏 跟哪个超级英雄并肩作战创建自己的游戏形象…

translation.en: creating your avatar…
translation.zh: （艾琳娜莫兰 心理学家）

translation.en: [Yago] It's an adventure in a world with lots of trees,
translation.zh: 这是一场冒险 这个世界里有好多树

translation.en: and underground mines, and you can mine anywhere.
translation.zh: 还有地下矿藏你可以在任何地方挖矿 （雅高弗利亚斯 马德里）

translation.en: And it was raining a bit and my rabbit drowned.
translation.zh: 有一次下雨了 我的小兔子淹死了

translation.en: The nurses started talking about how radically he had changed
translation.zh: 护士们开始谈论他因为玩了那些电子游戏

translation.en: thanks to playing those video games. He…
translation.zh: 发生了多么巨大的变化 他太开心了 甚至忘记了他卧病在床

translation.en: he was so entertained that he forgot he was ill in a room.
translation.zh: 他太开心了 甚至忘记了他卧病在床 （瓦莱撒勒斯维加特拉皮亚基金会副会长）

translation.en: [woman] He walked three steps, from the door to the garden,
translation.zh: 他从门口走了三步到花园

translation.en: and suddenly he stops and I asked him to move on,
translation.zh: 突然 他停住了 我叫他继续走

translation.en: and he was completely still, and I told him to walk,
translation.zh: 他完全静止不动了 我叫他往前走

translation.en: and he said, "Mom, look, I also have a shadow."
translation.zh: 他说：“妈妈 看呀 我也有影子”

translation.en: And I told him we all do.
translation.zh: 我告诉他 我们都有影子

translation.en: He said, "I didn't before."
translation.zh: 他说：“我以前没有呢”

translation.en: Then I realised, with artificial light, you don't cast a shadow.
translation.zh: 我这才意识到 人工灯光下没有影子

translation.en: And when he was in hospital, he thought everyone had a shadow but him.
translation.zh: 他在医院的时候 以为除了他自己其他人都有影子

translation.en: Yago had seen insect on the tablet.
translation.zh: 他曾经在平板电脑上看到过虫子的样子

translation.en: And, all of a sudden, he sees a fly.
translation.zh: 那天他突然看见一只苍蝇

translation.en: And he starts shouting in a way that he scared me.
translation.zh: 立刻用一种很可怕的声音尖叫起来

translation.en: I had to pick him up quickly and he covered his face.
translation.zh: 我只能赶紧抱起他来 他就捂住了脸

translation.en: And I told him that was an insect. And he said, "It flies very quickly!"
translation.zh: 我说那是只虫子他说：“它飞得太快了！”

translation.en: Yago has grown up in an adult world, of doctors and nurses,
translation.zh: 雅高是在医生护士和成年人的世界长大的

translation.en: but, thanks to video games, he's been in contact with his brothers
translation.zh: 但多亏了电子游戏他跟兄弟们有了联系

translation.en: his family, his friends, see the world,
translation.zh: 跟家人 朋友有了联系 看到了世界

translation.en: which he could only see through a window before.
translation.zh: 而以前 他都只能从窗户看到这一切

translation.en: And thanks to this console and tablet
translation.zh: 感谢游戏机和平板电脑

translation.en: that Juegaterapia gave us in the worst moment in our life.
translation.zh: 那是基金会在我们人生最艰难的时候送给我们的礼物

translation.en: [woman] We realised we had to humanize the rooms,
translation.zh: 我们意识到必须让这些房间更人性化

translation.en: those where they spend many hours,
translation.zh: 那些病人待得最久的地方

translation.en: maybe months hospitalised, always indoors, without going out.
translation.zh: 那些病人待得最久的地方 也许住院数月 一直在室内不出门

translation.en: When doctors let them, they open the door, come in,
translation.zh: 当医生让他们来的时候他们打开门 进来 就会被惊艳到

translation.en: and they're all amazed. They forget they're in hospital.
translation.zh: （卢尔德阿玛亚斯维加特拉皮亚基金会公关） 他们会忘记自己身在医院

translation.en: [woman] We came up with the Baby Pelones, a charity doll.
translation.zh: 我们设计出皮隆宝宝是个慈善玩偶

translation.en: David Bisbal, Ricky Martin, Shakira, Alejandro Sanz, Richard Gere, etc.
translation.zh: 做成大卫比斯巴尔 瑞奇马丁 夏奇拉亚雷汉德罗桑斯 理查基尔等等明星

translation.en: We're taking the game to hospitals.
translation.zh: 我们要把游戏带进医院

translation.en: [man] Get ready! Then let's get ready to rumble, guys.
translation.zh: 准备好！我们准备好冲锋吧！

translation.en: Look at this set up. What can Windy do? Windy's coming.
translation.zh: 看看这现场！ “旋风”能帮忙吗？“旋风”来了

translation.en: -[shoots] -No! And Phoebe wins.
translation.zh: 反恐精英胜利 反恐胜利啦！

translation.en: Can Rock do it? One against three,
translation.zh: “巨石”行吗？一对三

translation.en: -[shoots] -30 seconds left.
translation.zh: 还有30秒

translation.en: And TeenSlayer takes him down.
translation.zh: “巨石”想上去被“青少年杀手”搞定了

translation.en: [Josh]The beauty about games is they give us an opportunity to learn
translation.zh: 游戏的魅力在于让我们有机会 了解彼此 认识自己

translation.en: about each other and about ourselves.
translation.zh: 了解彼此 认识自己

translation.en: People are building personal communities with people they trust and learn from,
translation.zh: 我们跟彼此信任的人建立起群体 跟我们向之学习的人一起

translation.en: based on the folks they play with.
translation.zh: 都来自一起玩游戏的伙伴们

translation.en: [Raffy] I was growing up in a community that was very poor,
translation.zh: 我长大的社区非常贫穷

translation.en: in a community that was homophobic, transphobic,
translation.zh: 那里的人恐同 恐跨性别很多也反黑人

translation.en: often anti black or experiencing racism in some way, shape or form.
translation.zh: 那里的人恐同 恐跨性别很多也反黑人 经历着不同方式 不同样子不同形式的种族歧视

translation.en: And videogaming was a safe space for me.
translation.zh: 电子游戏就是我的避风港

translation.en: [Shawn] There are no black people in the industry. Where are they?
translation.zh: 在游戏业里是没有“黑人”的他们在哪儿？ 金钱太重要了因为游戏制作没有尽头

translation.en: Money is so important because games take forever to make.
translation.zh: 金钱太重要了因为游戏制作没有尽头

translation.en: And if…
translation.zh: 如果…

translation.en: Like, that's the number one. I think resources are the thing that keeps
translation.zh: 我猜这头号资源 就是阻止黑皮肤、棕皮肤和色谱上所有带颜色的皮肤的人

translation.en: black, brown, everyone across the spectrum from being able to make their games.
translation.zh: 就是阻止黑皮肤、棕皮肤和色谱上所有带颜色的皮肤的人 制作游戏的原因

translation.en: [Raffy] We don't often see the underrepresented faces.
translation.zh: 通常 你看不到那些不太具代表性的面孔

translation.en: The higher you go up, the wider it gets and the more male dominated it gets.
translation.zh: 位置越高 皮肤越白而且越受到男性支配

translation.en: And a lot of spaces that require risks, such as e-sports, for example.
translation.zh: 在很多需要冒险的领域 比如电竞

translation.en: You'll see that, while there are many fans who play at a smaller scale,
translation.zh: 你会看到虽然有很多粉丝小规模地在玩

translation.en: the people who are playing at the top are often white and men.
translation.zh: 顶级玩家往往是白人 男性

translation.en: That's because they can take the most risks.
translation.zh: 那是因为他们能够承担最大的风险

translation.en: [distorted male voice 2] Holy shit, girls are so bad. Stay in the kitchen.
translation.zh: （“我的游戏 我的名字”运动2018年） 去他妈的 女的真差劲 呆在厨房吧

translation.en: [distorted male voice 3] We have a girl…
translation.zh: 这局完了 我们队有个女的

translation.en: [Nicolle] "My game my name" was the project that was empowering women
translation.zh: “我的游戏 我的名字”是为女性玩家发起的活动

translation.en: to put their real nicknames and don't be ashamed or afraid
translation.zh: 鼓励她们使用真正的昵称不要因为羞愧或害怕

translation.en: of using your own nickname.
translation.zh: 而不敢使用自己的昵称

translation.en: [Cordelia] I have dealt with a lot of comments and
translation.zh: 我面对过很多黑评论了 我本身还算脸皮厚的

translation.en: I have a relatively thick skin.
translation.zh: 我本身还算脸皮厚的

translation.en: But sometimes, something just catches you,
translation.zh: 但有时候 有些东西还是会戳痛你

translation.en: when you're in a bad mood on the wrong day.
translation.zh: 尤其是心情不好的时候时机不对的时候

translation.en: It can be pretty crushing because when people find out you're a woman,
translation.zh: 甚至有可能令人崩溃因为别人发现你是女性时

translation.en: even if it's a gender neutral nickname
translation.zh: 即便你用着一个中性昵称

translation.en: or you don't use the voice chat deliberately,
translation.zh: 即便故意不开语音

translation.en: if they find out anyway,
translation.zh: 只要一被发现

translation.en: they suddenly will hurl an insult at you based on knowing that you're a woman.
translation.zh: 他们就会一拥而上对你进行侮辱就因为知道了你是女性

translation.en: [Erika] Racism, sexism, homophobia, straight up bad behavior…
translation.zh: 种族歧视 性别歧视 恐同 直截了当的恶行

translation.en: That's always been there.
translation.zh: 都一直存在

translation.en: It's not gotten worse because now we're in the age of digital.
translation.zh: 情况并没有变得更糟糕 因为我们现在生活在数字时代 对吧

translation.en: Everybody's got their own camera,
translation.zh: 每个人都有摄像头

translation.en: or connection to the rest of the world right here.
translation.zh: 或者自己手头上就能连通世界

translation.en: [Cordelia] Some people think women tournaments are stupid in e-sports
translation.zh: 有些人认为全女性的锦标赛 在电竞行业来说是愚蠢的

translation.en: because there should be no differences between men and women,
translation.zh: 因为男女玩家之间不应该有差异

translation.en: but they are a great stepping stone into building a larger player base
translation.zh: 但这些比赛正是踏脚石一般的存在 它们建立起更庞大的玩家基础

translation.en: for more girls and women to enter the scene.
translation.zh: 让更多的女孩和女性进入电竞视野

translation.en: [Marta] The leagues are mixed, and the problem so far is
translation.zh: 联盟是不分性别的 目前的问题是 女性职业玩家的水平…

translation.en: that women don't play as well as men, who play professionally.
translation.zh: 目前的问题是 女性职业玩家的水平… （电影骑士电竞公司 人力主管） 不如男性玩家

translation.en: Obviously, our main goal is to have mixed teams, not only the female ones.
translation.zh: 显然 我们主要的目的是组成混合战队 而不是全女子战队

translation.en: Right now it's growing. Even if it looks slow, it's very fast.
translation.zh: 现在 队伍正在壮大 尽管看起来壮大得挺慢其实已经很快了

translation.en: Every year there are more professional opportunities for girls.
translation.zh: 每年 女生都会有更多职业机会

translation.en: I've fought against the odds to be sure I wasn't chosen just because I was a girl.
translation.zh: 我一直拼力证明自己的入选 并不仅仅因为我是女生

translation.en: I don't to be a marketing face.
translation.zh: 我不想成为营销门面

translation.en: I want to be treated according to my level.
translation.zh: （《彩虹六号》职业玩家） 我想要得到与我等级相符的待遇

translation.en: [Roy] We may look and sound different,
translation.zh: 我们也许外表不同 声音不同

translation.en: have different names and do different things.
translation.zh: 名字不同 行业不同

translation.en: But there's no difference between us.
translation.zh: 但你我之间没有差别

translation.en: We can all do the same things. We can all grow. We can all achieve.
translation.zh: 我们做着同样的事情我们都能成长和取得成就

translation.en: We have to change that thinking.
translation.zh: 我们必须改变那个观念

translation.en: Inclusivity, acceptance, belief…
translation.zh: 包容 接受 信任

translation.en: All of these things that we are fighting for and that we want,
translation.zh: 所有这些我们为之奋斗的和我们想要的东西

translation.en: they take time.
translation.zh: 都需要时间

translation.en: [Anne] We live on a small river island on the Thames.
translation.zh: 我们住在泰晤士河的一个小岛上

translation.en: My husband had a boat,
translation.zh: 我丈夫有艘船

translation.en: we were trying to find a house that had mooring space.
translation.zh: 我们想找一栋有停泊空间的房子

translation.en: Benji has always loved sports.
translation.zh: 本吉一直都喜欢运动

translation.en: His two main ones were cricket and tenpin bowling.
translation.zh: 他最爱的是板球和十柱保龄球

translation.en: And he actually started bowling on his second birthday,
translation.zh: 他其实两岁生日那天就开始打保龄球了

translation.en: and then he ended up doing his first competition when he was three.
translation.zh: 然后三岁就参加了第一场比赛

translation.en: He had a natural flair for it.
translation.zh: 他对这个有天赋

translation.en: He developed Osgood-Schlatters',
translation.zh: 他患上了胫骨结节骨骺炎

translation.en: so he was in a lot of pain when he walked.
translation.zh: 走路的时候会特别疼

translation.en: So after doing any sort of rugby or any sort of sporting activity,
translation.zh: 所以 只要玩一下类似橄榄球或者其他什么体育活动之后

translation.en: he would be… I mean,
translation.zh: 他就会 我是说…

translation.en: literally you think he was 70 year old afterwards walking.
translation.zh: 真的 你会觉得他走路就像个老头子

translation.en: The doctors suggested that he stayed off sports for a while,
translation.zh: 医生建议他暂停运动

translation.en: and naturally then, you know, computer games sort of took over and…
translation.zh: 后来就 你懂的电脑游戏就自然而然地取而代之了

translation.en: he's never really gone back to doing any of those other sports.
translation.zh: 他就再也没有正经去参加其他户外运动了

translation.en: [Benjy] I've always wanted to be a professional gamer. Since I've been 10,
translation.zh: 我一直想做职业玩家 从十岁就开始想了

translation.en: I've always looked YouTube videos and stuff of professional gamers.
translation.zh: 我总是在YouTube上看视频什么的 看这些职业玩家怎么玩

translation.en: And it's giving me like this…
translation.zh: 它就给我这种…

translation.en: I've just always wanted to be at the point…
translation.zh: 说不清 我就是一直很想 到达那些我崇拜的人的位置

translation.en: of other people that I looked up to.
translation.zh: 到达那些我崇拜的人的位置

translation.en: [Anne] As a parent,
translation.zh: 作为家长

translation.en: I was always trying to get him off the computer, you know.
translation.zh: 我总试图让他别对着电脑 你懂的

translation.en: There's always a battle, you know.
translation.zh: 亲子大战日常上演 懂吧？

translation.en: He's got school the next day. He's got exams coming up,
translation.zh: 他第二天还要上学啊 还有考试啊

translation.en: trying to balance that whole thing between doing school work
translation.zh: 尽量在学业和其他活动之间

translation.en: and other activities, as well as playing video games.
translation.zh: 包括玩电子游戏之间 取得平衡

translation.en: And myself as a parent didn't realize
translation.zh: 我自己作为家长 并没有意识到世界上甚至还存在

translation.en: that there was an industry out there that he could become involved in.
translation.zh: 我自己作为家长 并没有意识到世界上甚至还存在 可能会招揽他的这种产业

translation.en: And it wasn't until he did a competition called Montana Black.
translation.zh: 直到有一次他参加了一个叫什么“蒙大拿老黑”的比赛

translation.en: And I remember it was Sunday night. I was already in bed.
translation.zh: 我记得那是周日晚上 我已经上床了

translation.en: And he came in to me and told me that he had won 10,000 dollars.
translation.zh: 他过来告诉我 他赢了一万美元

translation.en: And it was like, "Really? Are you sure?"
translation.zh: 我就：“真的？你确定？”

translation.en: And he was like, "No, no. We've come first."
translation.zh: 他说：“嗯 我们第一名”

translation.en: And it was like, "My God, really?"
translation.zh: 我就感觉：“我的天 真的？”

translation.en: And then it very quickly snowballs.
translation.zh: 后来就跟滚雪球似的了

translation.en: We formed a limited company and we tried to open up a bank account.
translation.zh: 我们成立了有限公司还试图开设公司账户

translation.en: The answer I got back from them was very much that they were seeing it
translation.zh: 银行的人答复我 基本上都是说 他们认为这是赌博

translation.en: as gambling as opposed to a competitive sports.
translation.zh: 而不是竞技体育

translation.en: And I had to explain, "Well, you know, if he was doing something like a…
translation.zh: 然后我就得解释 “那么 如果他是像网球运动员那样

translation.en: a tennis player going to Wimbledon, winning,
translation.zh: “那么 如果他是像网球运动员那样 参加温网大赛什么的 还赢了

translation.en: would you not accept that money into your account?
translation.zh: 你们难道不接受我们把奖金存到你们银行吗？”

translation.en: The Fortnite World Cup was a huge moment in e-sports.
translation.zh: 《堡垒之夜》世界杯当时是电竞界的盛事

translation.en: It was a real coming of age moment, I think for a lot of people
translation.zh: 对于很多不玩游戏的人来说 那是一个真正的成人礼

translation.en: who don't play games. They didn't really know what e-sports was.
translation.zh: 那是一个真正的成人礼 他们那时候还不明白电竞是什么

translation.zh: 突然 出现了这么盛大的赛事给出电竞史上最大的奖励

translation.en: It's also being held in a stadium that people know for the US Open Tennis.
translation.zh: 并且举行的地点还是人们都熟悉的美网公开赛体育场

translation.en: So, suddenly it brings all this interest into e-sports.
translation.zh: 所以突然之间大家的注意力都被吸引到了电竞上

translation.en: People start to take it seriously.
translation.zh: 人们才开始当这个行业是一回事了

translation.en: [Anne] New York was the first big line competition.
translation.zh: 纽约市是第一个大型现场比赛

translation.en: I mean, Benji up until then has only just played in his bedroom.
translation.zh: 我是说 本吉直到那时候为止都只在自己的卧室打游戏

translation.en: He was so excited. We were all excited about going.
translation.zh: 他超级兴奋 能去比赛我们都很兴奋

translation.en: He was finally getting to meet the players that he's spoken to for ages.
translation.zh: 因为他终于能见到天天挂在嘴上念叨的小伙伴了

translation.en: Benji just slaying out an entire lobby by himself--
translation.zh: 说真的 看着本吉单枪匹马扫清整个大厅

translation.en: -Yes. -that was… It's like it's art, man.
translation.zh: 说真的 看着本吉单枪匹马扫清整个大厅 那是艺术啊

translation.en: It was a really good experience. I met so many cool people.
translation.zh: 那是很愉快的经历我见到好多很酷的人

translation.en: [Anne] I was very, very nervous.
translation.zh: 我很紧张的

translation.en: The first day he was in competition, I was quite emotional, I kept crying.
translation.zh: 事实上 他比赛的第一天 我整个人很激动 一直哭

translation.en: -[man] He manages to take that-- -[yells]
translation.zh: 他成功拿下了…

translation.en: [Anne] He was totally devastated. For him,
translation.zh: 他彻底崩溃了 对他来说

translation.en: being number one and champion was what he went out to,
translation.zh: 比赛就是奔着第一名拿冠军去的

translation.en: and from a parent perspective, it was very much
translation.zh: 而从家长的角度来说 重点其实更在于帮他正确调整期望值

translation.en: to manage his expectations, that if he didn't do well,
translation.zh: 重点其实更在于帮他正确调整期望值 万一发挥不好

translation.en: how he would cope with that after the event.
translation.zh: 在赛后他应该如何应对

translation.en: I don't know what happened. I think it was a combination of me not playing my best
translation.zh: 我不知道发生了什么 我想 那是集发挥欠佳

translation.en: and getting a bit unlucky.
translation.zh: 和有点倒霉于一体的关系

translation.en: I thought I was going to be nervous, but I wasn't nervous at all.
translation.zh: 我也以为会紧张但实际上一点都不紧张

translation.en: I just didn't really play to my standard and that's why I didn't place my best.
translation.zh: 我只是没发挥出应有的水平这导致了我成绩不好的结果

translation.en: [Anne] Everyone wants to be a footballer. Only that small
translation.zh: 每个人都想成为橄榄球运动员 只有1%的人能真正做到

translation.en: one percent is really going to make it.
translation.zh: 只有1%的人能真正做到

translation.en: And e-sports is no different to that.
translation.zh: 电竞其实没有区别

translation.en: [Benji] In the future, I want to be the best.
translation.zh: 将来 我想当最厉害的那个

translation.en: I'm going to keep practicing as much as possible.
translation.zh: 我会拼尽全力练习

translation.en: I will put in all the time and effort to make sure I'm as good as I can be.
translation.zh: 确保投入自己全部的时间和努力 确保我做得到自己最好的水平

translation.en: Whatever my children are interested in,
translation.zh: 无论我的孩子对什么感兴趣

translation.en: I will try and help them to achieve whatever they want to.
translation.zh: 我都会帮助他们做到他们想做的事

translation.en: [José] When I was little, there was time for lots of games;
translation.zh: （西班牙 加利西亚） 我小时候 有大把时间玩游戏

translation.en: time for marbles,
translation.zh: 玩弹珠啊

translation.en: for palen, a game which is now lost, time for football,
translation.zh: 玩“帕连” 一种已经失传的游戏还有踢球啊 （爷爷）

translation.en: sometimes even with no ball.
translation.zh: 有时候没球也能踢

translation.en: We had to use a sock filled with straw instead. That was the ball.
translation.zh: 我们只能用塞了草的袜子代替 用那个当球

translation.en: We didn't have other options, no TV, no radio,
translation.zh: 没有其他选择呀 没有电视 没有电台

translation.en: so we would join other boys and play these games.
translation.zh: 我们就喊其他男孩子一起这么玩儿

translation.en: Here in Galicia, families had lots of children,
translation.zh: 加利西亚那时候的家庭都会生好几个 不过只有一个继承人

translation.en: but only one heir, who inherited 3/5 of the property,
translation.zh: 能继承五分之三的财产

translation.en: so 2/5 for four or five wasn't enough.
translation.zh: 所以四五个孩子来分剩下的部分是不够的

translation.en: Therefore, the others had to emigrate.
translation.zh: 因此 其他后代就得移民了

translation.en: You had to travel by boat and the voyage took about a month.
translation.zh: 你得坐船走整个航程要差不多一个月

translation.en: They had no money. They left with nothing but the clothes on their backs.
translation.zh: 他们也没钱走的时候只背了几件衣服

translation.en: They would send a letter every 2 or 3 months,
translation.zh: 他们两三个月会写封信回来

translation.en: and it would arrive one, two or three months later.
translation.zh: 信在路上也要走一二三个月

translation.en: [José Luis] We spend the summer in my father's home village.
translation.zh: 我们会在父亲的家乡过夏天 那是加利西亚的一个小镇

translation.en: It is a small town in Galicia, where…
translation.zh: 那是加利西亚的一个小镇 是我父亲这边的祖先一直生活的地方

translation.en: all my father's ancestors lived: grandparents, great-grandparents…
translation.zh: 是我父亲这边的祖先一直生活的地方 祖父 曾祖父…

translation.en: When we were little,
translation.zh: 我们小时候

translation.en: all the children of the people who'd had to go away for work went there.
translation.zh: 所有留守儿童都会回到那里去 （工程师及玩家）

translation.en: People from Mexico, France, Bilbao, La Corunna, Madrid.
translation.zh: 从墨西哥 法国 毕尔巴鄂拉科鲁尼亚 马德里回来的

translation.en: Once we'd left, we didn't see each other.
translation.zh: 一旦分开 我们就难再见了 只能靠一般信件往来保持联系

translation.en: We could only get in touch by regular post.
translation.zh: 只能靠一般信件往来保持联系

translation.en: Manuel's a friend I have in Ribas Pequeñas, a village in Galicia.
translation.zh: 曼努埃是我在里巴斯培奎纳斯的朋友那是加利西亚的一个村子 （卢卡斯莱尔 马德里）

translation.en: I go there in the holidays and he lives there.
translation.zh: 我放假就会过去 他住在那里

translation.en: Adults don't usually play, and, here, there are only adults.
translation.zh: 大人们都不玩的 那里只有大人 （曼努埃拉戈亚）西班牙 加利西亚）

translation.en: [Lucas] When my parents were little,
translation.zh: 我父母小时候

translation.en: they used to come here too and meet their friends.
translation.zh: 也会来这里跟朋友相见

translation.en: And they didn't see each other again until the year after, when they came back to the village.
translation.zh: 然后就要等下一年回来才能再见了

translation.en: On the other hand, we see each other in the village.
translation.zh: 另一方面 我们会在村里见面

translation.en: [Manuel] When they go back home, to Madrid, to France,
translation.zh: 他们各自回家 回马德里 回法国

translation.en: I stay here and we can keep in touch and play together.
translation.zh: 我留在这里我们可以保持联系 一起玩

translation.en: When they meet, they play football or swim in the river,
translation.zh: 他们见了面 就会一起踢球或者去河里游泳

translation.en: but, when they aren't together, they can't do that anymore.
translation.zh: 但他们不在一起的话就没法这么玩了

translation.en: And they meet online to play video games,
translation.zh: 所以他们会一起上网打游戏

translation.en: and, as they have fun, they do it quite often,
translation.zh: 孩子们经常约在一起 玩得很开心他们之间的纽带

translation.en: and their link is much closer than by letter or phone, which are passive.
translation.zh: 孩子们经常约在一起 玩得很开心他们之间的纽带 比被动的通信或电话要紧密得多

translation.en: It's a great way to keep and build on friendships.
translation.zh: 这是保持和建立友谊的好办法

translation.en: If you meet to play, that link will grow and last.
translation.zh: 如果能见面一起玩这条纽带就会延伸 持续

translation.en: I wish they could have more calmness.
translation.zh: 我希望他们能更淡定

translation.en: Now everything's very quick, they want everything right now.
translation.zh: 现在什么都太快了想要什么都得立马得到

translation.en: I can hardly assimilate modern technology. I don't get involved with it.
translation.zh: 我很难吸收现代科技 并不参与其中

translation.en: It's a different life…
translation.zh: 那是不一样的生活

translation.en: luckily, for the better.
translation.zh: 幸好 是更好的生活

translation.en: [Michal] People are more connected than before.
translation.zh: 人们比从前联系紧密得多

translation.en: We're looking at people who are thinking globally
translation.zh: 我们关注有全球化思维的人

translation.en: because when they wake up in their slippers, turn on their PC,
translation.zh: 因为当他们起床 穿上拖鞋 打开电脑

translation.en: they're interacting immediately with the entire world.
translation.zh: 他们是立即与整个世界互动的

translation.en: I know couples who play World of Warcraft and they got together
translation.zh: 我认识有些夫妻 他们… 是因为玩《魔兽世界》走到一起的

translation.en: through that because that social aspect of the video games
translation.zh: 因为电子游戏有社交功能这些人可以在游戏中

translation.en: where these people can meet each other within the game,
translation.zh: 因为电子游戏有社交功能这些人可以在游戏中 认识彼此 继而发展到现实生活中去

translation.en: and then meet each other in real life. The game can be used like an icebreaker.
translation.zh: 认识彼此 继而发展到现实生活中去 所以 游戏可以用来破冰

translation.en: [María] I got into the game, I got any nickname
translation.zh: 我进了游戏 起了个昵称

translation.en: I managed to find him because they told me his name was Neca,
translation.zh: 设法找到了他因为他们告诉我 他的昵称是内卡

translation.en: and I started talking to him through the game chat.
translation.zh: 我就开始在游戏聊天里跟他说话

translation.en: In the game you can talk to someone if you know their nickname.
translation.zh: 游戏里 你只要知道一个人的昵称就能跟他说话的

translation.en: So I thought who is talking to me? Maybe it's a friend with a new character.
translation.zh: 所以我就想：“是谁在跟我说话呢？”说不定是用了个新身份的老朋友

translation.en: [María] And is trolling.
translation.zh: 在逗我玩呢

translation.en: And in the end she confesses it to me and she tells me it was her.
translation.zh: 最后 她跟我坦白了告诉我是她在跟我聊天

translation.en: And with that she conquered me.
translation.zh: 就这样 她征服了我

translation.en: That we both have the hobby of video games,
translation.zh: 我俩都喜欢玩电子游戏这件事

translation.en: made this relationship take hold.
translation.zh: 让我们的关系更牢固

translation.en: This was done in a very natural way and we knew this was for life.
translation.zh: 我们之间是非常自然而然的 我们当时就知道 这是一辈子的事

translation.en: [Soleil] I'm a bit shy, so it's hard for me to meet people, you know.
translation.zh: 我是比较害羞的 然后 你懂的叫我去认识别人可不容易

translation.en: Like, you know, finding people who you have something in common with.
translation.zh: 比如 去找跟我有共同点的人什么的

translation.en: And realistically, those are gamers,
translation.zh: 而且 现实中那些人都是玩家 你懂吧？

translation.en: so you feel that sense of community and connection through that.
translation.zh: 所以 你可以从中得到集体和连通的感觉

translation.en: I depended on my eyes to see what was going on,
translation.zh: 我非常依赖双眼去看发生的事情

translation.en: if there's another player around? So that was really helpful.
translation.zh: 如果有玩家在附近 那就很有帮助了

translation.en: And now it's just so much better with all these new features.
translation.zh: 现在有了这么多新功能 体验更好了

translation.en: [Joseph] She has grown so much. She's gained a lot of self-esteem.
translation.zh: 她成长了太多 她的自信提高了很多

translation.en: She's made a lot of friends and has networked.
translation.zh: 交了很多朋友 还会经营人际网

translation.en: And it's been a really amazing experience.
translation.zh: 这种经历真的很了不起

translation.en: She is supported by the gaming community. And I couldn't be more happy.
translation.zh: 她从游戏群体得到很多支持 我再高兴不过了

translation.en: [Denise] Everything John does has to be done by a carer of himself.
translation.zh: 约翰的每件事都得由一位看护或者我自己来完成

translation.en: He's got muscular dystrophy,
translation.zh: 他患有肌肉萎缩

translation.en: and even scratching his nose, a carer has to do it.
translation.zh: 就连蹭鼻子这种小动作都得由看护人帮忙

translation.en: John's ventilator is actually breathing for him.
translation.zh: 约翰实际上要靠呼吸机来呼吸

translation.en: He can never be left alone.
translation.zh: 他绝对不能一个人待着

translation.en: If it comes off, the tubing from the neck,
translation.zh: 如果脖子上的管子掉了

translation.en: in seconds, he will die.
translation.zh: 几秒钟之内他就会死掉

translation.en: I used to dream about playing football.
translation.zh: 我曾经梦想过可以踢足球

translation.en: Without me knowing,
translation.zh: 有一天

translation.en: we ended up in Manchester
translation.zh: 我们突然去了曼彻斯特

translation.en: at Old Trafford, and I met all the players,
translation.zh: 到了老特拉福德 我就“哇”这样 今天 我们将见到全体曼联球员

translation.en: and Alex Ferguson.
translation.zh: 还有亚历克斯弗格森本人

translation.en: That there is amazing. One of the best day of my life.
translation.zh: 太美妙了那是我一生中最美好的日子之一

translation.en: I was struggling,
translation.zh: 我很纠结

translation.en: so I decided to go to the Internet
translation.zh: 就决定上网看看

translation.en: to see if there is anybody or any charity that can help.
translation.zh: 有没有什么人或者慈善组织能帮忙的

translation.en: [Mark] Special Effect is a charity that help people
translation.zh: “特效”慈善机构专门帮助那些

translation.en: with physical disabilities to play video games,
translation.zh: 有身体残疾的人学会玩电子游戏

translation.en: everybody's disability is different.
translation.zh: 每个人的残疾都不一样

translation.en: We're talking about minute movements that we've got to harness.
translation.zh: 我们的任务是要控制到微小的运动

translation.en: Milimeters of movements.
translation.zh: 毫米级的运动

translation.en: We are looking to modify existing or new equipment in unique ways
translation.zh: 实际上是以独特的方式修改现有的或新的设备

translation.en: so that we create totally custom set ups, which are totally right
translation.zh: 以此创建完全适合特定受助人的 量身定制的设置

translation.en: for that person's disability to enable them to get the best out of their game.
translation.zh: 量身定制的设置 让他们能够得到最佳的游戏体验

translation.en: [Gerard] I didn't think we'd ever get here.
translation.zh: 我从未想过我能走到这一步

translation.en: And so I was pretty proud
translation.zh: 所以 我非常自豪

translation.en: that we got to the stage where
translation.zh: 我们能走到这个阶段 能够开发足够先进的设备

translation.en: we can develop equipment that's good enough for everybody to use.
translation.zh: 能够开发足够先进的设备 给所有人使用

translation.en: It gives anyone the opportunity to game, and that's important.
translation.zh: 它让任何人都有机会玩游戏这非常重要

translation.en: [John] In video games you can do many things
translation.zh: 在电子游戏中 你可以做到许许多多

translation.en: that I can't in the real world.
translation.zh: 我现实中无法实现的事情

translation.en: Like driving or running, kicking a football.
translation.zh: 比如开车 奔跑 踢球

translation.en: It makes you feel you're there even if you're physically not.
translation.zh: 它让你有真实感 就是身临其境

translation.en: In your mind, you're playing.
translation.zh: 在你的脑海里 你是真的在玩

translation.en: In video games, I like to make friends,
translation.zh: 我喜欢在电子游戏里交朋友

translation.en: and know different people from all over the world.
translation.zh: 认识世界各地不同的人

translation.en: Because it feels equal.
translation.zh: 因为你受到的是平等对待

translation.en: They see the gamer,
translation.zh: 他们看到的是玩家

translation.en: not the person behind it.
translation.zh: 而不是背后操作的人

translation.en: [Laura] Michael was very quick to develop.
translation.zh: 迈克尔长得很快

translation.en: We would give him something like Lego and he would open on Christmas morning,
translation.zh: 我们送给他乐高一类的礼物他就在圣诞节早晨拆开玩

translation.en: and he would not stop for a drink, for toilet,
translation.zh: 途中不会停下来喝水上厕所 吃东西之类

translation.en: for food or anything until he completed that.
translation.zh: 途中不会停下来喝水上厕所 吃东西之类 非要完成不可

translation.en: [Karl] He was very focused,
translation.zh: 他非常专注

translation.en: He liked his cars, the trains…
translation.zh: 他喜欢他的小汽车 小火车 非常喜欢机动车玩具

translation.en: He was very much into vehicles.
translation.zh: 非常喜欢机动车玩具

translation.en: [Laura] By the time he was a year old, I then had Nathan, his brother.
translation.zh: 他满周岁的时候 我又有了弟弟内森

translation.en: Both have been obsessed with computers ever since they were little.
translation.zh: 两个男孩子从小 就对电脑着了迷

translation.en: We were both into computers as well. We used to play on them in our spare time.
translation.zh: 我俩都喜欢玩电脑 以前一有空就会一起玩电脑

translation.en: He came home with some bruises on him, really big impact bruises, like,
translation.zh: 他有时候会带着浑身淤青回家是大面积淤青 我问他

translation.en: "How did you do that?" "I don't know."
translation.zh: “你怎么弄的？”他说：“不知道”

translation.en: He's not getting bullied at school. We're not doing anything at home…
translation.zh: 他在学校并没有受欺负 我们在家也绝对没有动过手

translation.en: This got to be medical.
translation.zh: 这肯定是身体有问题

translation.en: It was knowing.
translation.zh: 他那时候才九岁

translation.en: It's been a tumultuous six years since then.
translation.zh: 从那往后的六年 不得安宁

translation.en: [Laura] My mom supported me from day of diagnosis.
translation.zh: 我妈妈从确诊那天开始就一直支持我

translation.en: But then mom's health deteriorated herself,
translation.zh: 但后来 妈妈的健康每况愈下

translation.en: and then passed away.
translation.zh: 后来就过世了

translation.en: Just after Michael's birthday in April,
translation.zh: 那是四月的一天 迈克尔刚刚度过

translation.en: of the first year of treatment.
translation.zh: 抗癌第一年的生日

translation.en: We lost our… our biggest asset in supporting Laura and Michael.
translation.zh: 我们失去了养育劳拉和迈克尔的最大力量

translation.en: So we had to sort of close ranks and step up.
translation.zh: 所以我们一家人必须团结到一起齐心协力

translation.en: [Mathew] That was meant to be the big win.
translation.zh: 那应该算是巨大的成功 不是吗？

translation.en: It was all over. We… We survived the war.
translation.zh: 那时候一切都结束了我们从抗癌战争中活了下来

translation.en: All seemed relatively under control.
translation.zh: 有那么几个月 一切看起来

translation.en: For a few months.
translation.zh: 都在掌控之中

translation.en: [Ruth] Unfortunately, Michael relapsed, so he had to have more intensive treatment
translation.zh: 不幸的是 迈克尔疾病复发 然后 他不得不接受更严格的治疗

translation.en: and ultimately had to go and have a bone marrow transplant
translation.zh: 最终 必须接受骨髓移植

translation.en: where they basically wipe out your immune system.
translation.zh: 这个过程基本上是消灭了你的免疫系统

translation.en: [Karl] He didn't get fixed on one game.
translation.zh: 他无法专注在一个游戏上

translation.en: He could play a game for 20 to 30 minutes,
translation.zh: 他能玩个二三十分钟然后就必须换个游戏

translation.en: and then he'd have to switch game. I think Elite
translation.zh: 他能玩个二三十分钟然后就必须换个游戏 《精英》应该是第一款

translation.en: was the first time where he could go longer than that half an hour.
translation.zh: 《精英》应该是第一款 他能玩超过一个半小时的游戏

translation.en: [Paige] Elite: Dangerous is a one to one representation of our own galaxy.
translation.zh: 《精英：危机四伏》是我们这个银河系的 一比一化身

translation.en: You are not relied upon to save the world, you are to live in it.
translation.zh: 你不是拯救世界的依靠你是活在这个世上的依靠

translation.en: You can do heroic things if you wish to. You can also be a bad guy if you wish to.
translation.zh: 只要你想单枪匹马也能做出英雄事迹 你要想的话 也可以当坏人

translation.en: It works via the Internet, it's multiuser,
translation.zh: 游戏在互联网上运行多用户同时登录

translation.en: so a group of you can go off and have adventures together in the game.
translation.zh: 你们可以组队 在游戏中一起冒险

translation.en: [Mathew] In the last year of Michael's life, we were definitely…
translation.zh: 迈克尔生命的最后一年里我们绝对是…

translation.en: We were co-pilots in Elite.
translation.zh: 我们在《精英》里给对方当副驾

translation.en: And often with…
translation.zh: 经常还有…

translation.en: Nathan would join us from time to time.
translation.zh: 内森时不时也会一起玩

translation.en: [Nathan] I played the devil's advocate, so I would ram his ship

translation.zh: 主要关注的是三维空间中的感知和选择性注意

translation.zh: 我是跟班上的朋友一起开始上油管的

translation.zh: 我的内容大部分就是聊电子游戏 有时候聊动漫

translation.zh: 尽量用滑稽幽默的方式做得好看有趣

translation.zh: 我是因为坚持才出名的 这非常重要

translation.en: and creating content people were interested in.
translation.zh: 我创作人们感兴趣的内容

translation.en: If a new game came out, I would buy it and I filmed myself playing it
translation.zh: 出了新游戏我就买来拍自己玩游戏的视频

translation.en: so people could also enjoy it.
translation.zh: 让大家都一起开心

translation.zh: 我每天在家玩 看油管上的视频

translation.zh: 有一天我突然想：“我怎么不行呢？我也整天打游戏啊”

translation.en: I'm all day playing.
translation.zh: 有一天我突然想：“我怎么不行呢？我也整天打游戏啊” （内容创作人）

translation.en: Why shouldn't I show them?"
translation.zh: “干吗不秀出来给大家看？”

translation.en: Because many people say that, taking into account my difficulties,
translation.zh: 因为很多人都说 我这个残疾人

translation.en: I play better than other people with no handicap in their hands.
translation.zh: 都比很多双手完好的人打得好

translation.en: I made a video on my channel, because they wanted to know how I played.
translation.zh: 我就在自己频道上发了个视频因为他们想知道我是怎么玩游戏的

translation.en: And then my channel started to get off the ground.
translation.zh: 就这样 我的频道起飞啦

translation.zh: 我爸妈很疑惑 问我：“这是要干吗？”

translation.en: and I said "I don't know, dad. I'm having fun. I don't know. I enjoy it."
translation.zh: 我说：“不知道啊 爸我开心呢 我也不知道 就好玩”

translation.en: You have fun with your garden, and I play games, record it and upload it.
translation.zh: 你去你的院子里玩吧我就玩游戏 录视频 上传就好

translation.zh: 最红的名人不是那些媒体上经常露面的演员

translation.en: These are just individuals, mostly online.
translation.zh: 这些只是些普通人 网上的人

translation.zh: 你去看一些YouTube博主和照片墙博主 这些人比有些最红的演员影响力更大

translation.en: than some of the biggest actors.
translation.zh: 这些人比有些最红的演员影响力更大

translation.en: The ones of us who have a voice
translation.zh: 我们有些话语权的人正在塑造一种集体形象

translation.en: are setting up the collective imagination.
translation.zh: 我们有些话语权的人正在塑造一种集体形象 （嘻哈艺人西班牙 阿利坎特）

translation.en: And the children listening to us
translation.zh: 听我们音乐的孩子不需要老师

translation.zh: 听我们音乐的孩子不需要老师 不需要别人去告诉他们什么是对错

translation.en: But I think if we transmit values
translation.zh: 但我认为 如果我们能够传递价值观

translation.en: and a way to understand life,
translation.zh: 一种理解生命 理解社会生活的方式

translation.en: we're helping set up tomorrow's society.
translation.zh: 我们就是在助力明天的社会建设

translation.en: [narrator] Technology will change the world as we know it,
translation.zh: 科技会继续改变我们所认知的世界

translation.en: improving our quality of life,
translation.zh: 提高我们的生活质量

translation.en: but also presenting us with new challenges.
translation.zh: 但同时也给我们带来新的挑战

translation.en: We are living through a revolution like never seen before,
translation.zh: 我们活在一场前无古人的大变革之中

translation.en: in which communications and connectivity are not only letting us play in new ways,
translation.zh: 这场变革里 交流通信和网络连接不仅仅给了我们新的玩耍方式

translation.en: but also transform the way we used to play.
translation.zh: 同时也改变着我们过去的娱乐

translation.en: [Jake] VR and AR allows you to have a natural interaction with the world
translation.zh: VR虚拟现实和AR增强现实技术让你与世界自然互动

translation.en: rather than having a console or display or some sort of wearable,
translation.zh: 不用再拿遥控器 看着屏幕或者戴着一堆装备了

translation.en: it'd just be there.
translation.zh: 它就在那里 透明的

translation.en: It'll be transparent. You won't even be thinking about it.
translation.zh: 它就在那里 透明的 你甚至都不会去想它

translation.en: [Brennan] It's leveraging the ability for the computer to understand
translation.zh: 这种技术是利用计算机的能力 来智能地理解周围的世界

translation.en: the world that's around.
translation.zh: 来智能地理解周围的世界

translation.en: and there's this threshold in terms of data transfer that 5G gets passed.
translation.zh: 在数据传输方面存在的这个门槛 就要5G技术去跨越了

translation.en: [Chema] In real time, we'll be able to have VR, AR, HD gaming,
translation.zh: 我们未来会在实时拥有虚拟现实 增强现实 HD超高清游戏

translation.en: which will break all the barriers,
translation.zh: 增强现实 HD超高清游戏

translation.en: and will allow children all over the world to become close friends,
translation.zh: 它们将打破一切界限 让全世界的孩子成为亲密的朋友

translation.en: thanks to the virtual worlds in where they'll live.
translation.zh: 让全世界的孩子成为亲密的朋友 这都多亏了他们将要身处的虚拟世界

translation.en: History is being made in front of us, but also disappearing at the same time.
translation.zh: 历史就在我们眼前被创造着 但它同时也在消逝

translation.en: Something we just got used to is already gone
translation.zh: 有些我们刚习惯的东西在我们将之记录

translation.en: by the time we've documented and gotten used to it.
translation.zh: 并已然习惯之时 便已消失不见

translation.en: What will happen in the future? Will they leave a mark in humanity?
translation.zh: 未来会发生什么？它们会在人类史上留下印记吗？

translation.en: Or is this the culture? A culture of the ephemeral.
translation.zh: 还是会带来一种文化？一种短暂事物组成的文化

translation.en: [Roy] That unites more than ever any time right now,
translation.zh: 它们让我们前所未有地紧密相连

translation.en: we're in a very hostile environment for community, for faith in others…
translation.zh: 在现世这样一个重重敌意包裹着的环境里 为了群体 为了对他人的信任…

translation.en: And when you play these games, all of that sets aside.
translation.zh: 而当你玩起这些游戏一切都可以置之不理

translation.en: It makes sense to be skeptical or fearful of something new.
translation.zh: 怀疑或害怕新事物是可以理解的

translation.zh: 行业必须积极行动 但我们需要政府和家长们的支持

translation.en: and parents.
translation.zh: 但我们需要政府和家长们的支持

translation.en: [Marcos] It's very easy to blame video games.
translation.zh: 把锅丢给电子游戏是很容易的

translation.en: We need to know we're responsible for our children,
translation.zh: 但我们必须清楚对自己孩子应付的责任

translation.en: and we can't avoid that.
translation.zh: 不能逃避

translation.en: [Michal] At the end of the day, if you're worried about your children,
translation.zh: 说到底 如果你真的担心孩子

translation.en: pay attention to what they're doing.
translation.zh: 只需要关注一下他们在做的事情去认真了解 去跟他们聊聊

translation.zh: 只需要关注一下他们在做的事情去认真了解 去跟他们聊聊 他们会很开心你们能听他们聊自己爱的东西

translation.zh: 社会与新媒介永远相处不和谐

translation.en: Why don't we learn from them?
translation.zh: 我们为何不从中学习？

translation.zh: 是玩家 就玩游戏

translation.en: They tell you, "Get outside." "Go, go have a life."
translation.zh: “干吗打游戏啊？出去享受享受生活啊”
